project.textContent1: An application that will help teams solve work tasks efficiently. It will help organize the work so that everyone knows what to do. Track the progress of tasks, be aware of what is happening. Correctly plan the timing and scope of work.

developer.textContent2: I've been interested in Frontend development for over a year.
developer.textContent3: I am currently enrolled in a course Javascript/Front-end Mentoring Program (in English).
developer.textContent4: My goals are to deepen my knowledge of JavaScript, TypeScript, study Angular and successfully find a job in Europe.
developer.textContent5: Iâ€™m sociable person and a good team player. I have good organizational skills, able to deal with conflicts and compromise.

course.textContent2: This tutorial project was developed as part of the free online course  'Javascript/Front-end Mentoring Program (in English)' from The Rolling Scopes community.
course.textContent3: The training consists of 3 stages. There are strict requirements for the transition to each higher stage. This particular course of study takes place in the form of self-study. This means that students have access to pre-assessment of webinars and two-week live Q&A sessions with course trainers. Organizers provide students with a list of topics that must be covered for each stage with recommended deadlines.
course.textContent4: After accomplishing all three stages of education, students will receive an electronic certificate of completion.
